sentence: Following  the  cross-border  attacks  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  250  others  were  taken  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages,  he  dismissed  as  a  "big  lie",  external  accusations  that  he  had  also  encouraged  the  payments  in  order  to  strengthen  Hamas  at  the  expense  of  the  PA..
More  than  25,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  fighting,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.
This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
